column4: Hello, 1) How do I change an empty fat32 external HDD to an ntfs? 2) It just fell off the coffee table, 40 cm's high, is that enough to destroy the external HDD? I can't find it anymore, lsusb shows nothing.
your system does not recognize him anymore
on reboot does your bios see the HD ?
that means the external HD is dead, no?
Does you disk make any sound when you power up the pc ?
i would personnally test it on another machine to confirm that he is in fact dead
not the good kind imo though
from what you telling then i would confirm the HD dead
I just can't believe I haven't even used it yet and now it's dead
